analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/25/0x077eb19ec5b1d5a8b572746da35b543b6e675078.sol:
	Contract FilmCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/25/0x077eb19ec5b1d5a8b572746da35b543b6e675078.sol#217)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/25/0x077eb19ec5b1d5a8b572746da35b543b6e675078.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/25/0x077eb19ec5b1d5a8b572746da35b543b6e675078.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/25/0x077eb19ec5b1d5a8b572746da35b543b6e675078.sol#87) is not in mixedCase
